title: Chapter 1338 - A Formal Visit
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1338 - A Formal Visit

The Divine Capital Star Realm was the greatest of the star realms.

All six of the Ancient Guardian Clans of the Dao and many of the stars’ top factions had forces stationed here.

When word of the battle at the Divine Forge spread, those who stood at the pinnacle of the modern era found out immediately.

These top factions were instantly astonished.

“Just how strong has the Temple Master become?”

This was what everyone was wondering.

A month prior, in the battle at Universal Emptiness Temple, the Temple-Master single-handedly defeated four Nascent Divinity Realm revenants in a row.

Now, just a month later, he killed Nascent Divinity revenants without difficulty, as if he were slaughtering chickens!

This change left the top factions’ hearts quivering with fright.

“Times have changed. We thought that the Temple Master, a legend of the former era, was doomed to be left behind. Who’d have thought that he’d become this strong while still on the Path of Heaven’s Ascension….?” an old-timer said gravely. “What will happen if things go on like this?”

“Reincarnation is a natural counter to revenants, but the Temple Master is strong enough to slay Nascent Divinity Transcendents with ease, even without it. Is he… even...
